Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Ashland/63rd
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Ashland/63rd due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Ashland/63rd due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
